title: Enhancing Web Development Practical Skills: Mobile Augmented Reality-Based Language Job Competency Course

context.prior_knowledge: Above-beginner smartphone usage skills and understanding of basic language education theories
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design three language education scenarios using mobile augmented reality tools.
Learners can apply six core elements required for creating augmented reality-based educational content.
Learners can develop interactive educational modules in a smartphone environment and upload them to an LMS.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
